text: HBO Max‘s new TV and movie releases for February 3 to February 9 2025 include 90 Day Fiancé Pillow Talk: Before the 90 Days Season 7, Celebrity IOU Season 9, Izzy Does It Season 1, and We Live in Time. On February 3, 90 Day Fiancé Pillow Talk: Before the 90 Days Season 7 drops on HBO Max. The talk show features couples meeting in the U.S. under a special VISA. Later, they engage in conversations regarding love and talk about their cultural differences among other things. Further, Celebrity IOU Season 9 will be available on the streaming platform this week. It showcases renovation experts Jonathan Scott and Drew Scott as they help popular celebrities transform their homes. Also coming out on HBO Max is Izzy Does It Season 1. The reality show features Izzy Battres renovating luxurious homes on the California coast according to the wishes of her customers. Additionally, the romantic comedy We Live in Time will release on the streaming platform on February 7. It revolves around Almut and Tobias, whose unconventional love story is filled with interesting twists and turns. New HBO Max releases for February 3-9 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from February 3-February 9, 2025. html:
HBO Max‘s new TV and movie releases for February 3 to February 9 2025 include 90 Day Fiancé Pillow Talk: Before the 90 Days Season 7, Celebrity IOU Season 9, Izzy Does It Season 1, and We Live in Time.

On February 3, 90 Day Fiancé Pillow Talk: Before the 90 Days Season 7 drops on HBO Max. The talk show features couples meeting in the U.S. under a special VISA. Later, they engage in conversations regarding love and talk about their cultural differences among other things.

Further, Celebrity IOU Season 9 will be available on the streaming platform this week. It showcases renovation experts Jonathan Scott and Drew Scott as they help popular celebrities transform their homes.

Also coming out on HBO Max is Izzy Does It Season 1. The reality show features Izzy Battres renovating luxurious homes on the California coast according to the wishes of her customers.

Additionally, the romantic comedy We Live in Time will release on the streaming platform on February 7. It revolves around Almut and Tobias, whose unconventional love story is filled with interesting twists and turns.

New HBO Max releases for February 3-9 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from February 3-February 9, 2025.

February 3

  • 90 Day Fiancé Pillow Talk: Before the 90 Days, Season 7 (TLC)
  • Common Side Effects, Season 1 (Adult Swim)
  • Dog Detectives, Season 1 (Animal Planet)
  • Very Scary Lovers (ID)

February 4

  • Celebrity IOU, Season 9 (HGTV)
  • The Whole Story with Anderson Cooper, Season 3 (CNN Originals)

February 6

  • Destinations of the Damned with Zak Bagans, Season 1B (Discovery)
  • Izzy Does It, Season 1 (HGTV)
  • The Takedown: American Aryans (Max Original) 

February 7

  • Lu & The Bally Bunch, Season 1A
  • How I Left the Opus Dei (El Minuto Heroico: Yo También Dejé El Opus Dei) (Max Original) 
  • We Live in Time (A24) (2024)

February 8

  • Luther Vandross: Never Too Much (CNN Films)

February 9

  • Puppy Bowl XXI Kickoff (Animal Planet)
  • Puppy Bowl XXI (Animal Planet)

For more HBO Max content, check out the trailer of The White Lotus Season 3.
